item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260114.2)
item.description:
What's New

refactor: Centralize Vietnamese special key and word break logic

  • Add VNEngine.isVietnameseSpecialKey() to determine which characters

should be processed by Vietnamese engine based on input method

  • Add VNEngine.isWordBreak() to centralize word break detection logic
  • Fix standalone 'w' → 'ư' conversion in Telex/Simple Telex 2 modes
  • Refactor KeyboardEventHandler to use centralized isWordBreak()
  • Refactor XKeyIMController to use centralized isVietnameseSpecialKey()
  • This ensures consistent behavior between XKey app and XKeyIM

Bump version to 20260114.2
